TEXT.TITLE: MAGMA RAISES COPPER PRICE 0.50 CT TO 66.00 CTS
TEXT.BODY: Magma Copper Co, a subsidiary of Newmont Mining Corp, said it is raising its copper cathode price by 0.50 cent to 66.00 cents a lb, effective immediately. Reuter
